title: Кино про бандитов
overview: Le Havre, head of an organized crime group from a provincial town, is released from prison after 12 years of observation. Le Havre meets with two friends and will tell that they had a plan that he has in prison: he realized that his life is very eventful and you can make a real interesting movie about it. Le Havre believes that his film about gangsters will be true, which means it will most likely be the most diverse.
